column2: After Wells Fargo
column3: union fund adviser seeks other bank reviews BOSTON
column4: Oct 6 Union pension fund adviser CtW Investment Group on Thursday called on boards of large U.S. banks to review their employment practices in light of the scandal over fake customer accounts at Wells Fargo & Co
column5: and said it likely would not support the re-election of directors who failed to comply.

column2: Femsa's Oxxo signs Western Union remittances deal MEXICO CITY
column3: Oct 6 Mexico's Femsa said on Thursday its convenience store chain Oxxo had signed a deal with U.S. payments company Western Union   that will allow customers to receive international money transfers in its stores in Mexico.

column2: Verizon pushes for $1 bln discount on Yahoo deal - NY Post Oct 6 Verizon Communications is pressing for a $1 billion discount off its pending $4.8 billion agreement to buy Yahoo
column3: the New York Post reported
